Detailed Description

Abstract interface for an SD card.

◆ type()

virtual uint8_t SdCardInterface::type ( ) const
pure virtual

Return the card type: SD V1, SD V2 or SDHC/SDXC

Returns
0 - SD V1, 1 - SD V2, or 3 - SDHC/SDXC.
